name: campfire
notes:
once again i had the great honor of designing a square for bamcal.  this is the august main 12" square. i hope you will enjoy it! 

written instructions with step-by-step photos. 

skill level: intermediate.

the pattern uses 4 colors, but you can of course choose any number of colors. if you use another yarn than suggested, please note that this may affect the size of your square.
